title: EU DCC
description: EU Digital Covid Certificate Core Data Types

person_name.description: Person name: Surname(s), given name(s) - in that order

fn.title: Surname

gnt.description: The forename(s) of the person, transliterated ICAO 9303

certificate_id.description: Certificate Identifier, format as per UVCI: Annex 2 in  https://ec.europa.eu/health/sites/health/files/ehealth/docs/vaccination-proof_interoperability-guidelines_en.pdf
